sub_title: CEO of Heat Transfer ABC B.V. #RootCauseAnalysis #HEXSelection&Design #CostSavingManagement #(Online)Training #FoulingMitigation #HTRImodeling #FEEDPhaseDesign #Helixchanger | 17K+ Followers |
summary:
In need of thermal design expertize? Heat Transfer ABC is HTRI Member with more than 40 years of practical experience in thermal/mechanical design of (Advanced (Helixchanger/Rod/Twisted Tube/Bayonet) & HP (15.000 psig ASME VIII DIV.2) BLC & Deep Vacuüm) Shell & Tubulars, Air-Cooled, Economizers, Compact heat exchangers (BAHX, PCHX, PFHX, WPHX), Double Pipe, Multi-tube Hairpin, Electrical Heat Exchangers and Waste Heat Boilers (Syngas, SCW, SCWO, SC CO2, SC C2 and TLE's). Reactor evaluation for Styrene and Urea. Unsteady state heat transfer for nuclear reactor cooling. OLNG, MLNG, FLNG, SLNG for large kettles 6m. * 40 m., Hammerfest LNG Helifin 180 MW, IFV's, SCV, ORV, S&T LNG Vaporizers and Water Bath Heaters.

Demo’s of Heat Transfer course (S&T and Plate & Frame hx) & Masterclass Helixchanger available www.youtube.com search for bert boxma. English and Dutch spoken versions. Citizens of The Netherlands and Belgium can purchase the Dutch spoken course via www.leama.nl 
 
The cost of the LEAMA course (13 modules) : €990,= incl. certification.

The UK versions can be purchased through ABC for €100 per module.

Advisor on heat exchanger type selection including advanced fouling mitigation technologies for end users and EPC for on- and off-shore type of projects (eg. Shell, Fluor, CB&I, Huntsman and many others)

Trainer of  Basic & Advanced & HTRI Heat Transfer (E)Courses in The Netherlands, Belgium, Spain, Malaysia, Dubai, Indonesia, Oman, Qatar, Iran and Vietnam.

In-house trainer of Heat Transfer Courses: Tebodin(3x), KH-Engineering(2x), Stamicarbon, Vermeer Eemhaven(3x), Gusto, Jacobs(2x), DSM, Fluxys, Petronas(3x), Huntsman, VDL Klima, EM Baffle, ACP, Duiker Combustion Engineers(2x), Gasunie, FIB, PVC-MS, AAC, Badak LNG, LyondellBasell.

In total more than 1000 delegates (>250 companies) have recieved training.

www.facebook.com/heattransferabc for more Tip's & Trick's

Trouble Shooter on Heat Transfer related topics like tube vibration, advanced heat transfer technology, fouling etc. for end users:
BP Rotterdam/Gelsenkirchen, AVR, Cryonorm, INEOS, TOTAL, AGT, ACP, IBR, Tremco illbruck, Gasunie, Grontmij, North West Redwater, Lurgi, Momentive, Odfjell, Tronox, Indorama, Janssen Pharma, Proctor & Gamble, Unimills, Purac, Solvay, SCK.CEN, Frames, Shell, ExxonMobil Chemicals, Huntsman, TNO, Ormat, Air Products, Kellogg’s, MCL and EPC's : Technip Benelux, Continental Engineers, Jacobs, CB&I, Dns, Bilfinger, Vicoma, Burns&McDonnell and fabricators.
